response.original_title: How One City Is Quietly Dominating World Football
response.overview: Rosario is a small city in Argentina that boasts quadruple the national homicide rate, suffering a murder case, on average, once every 30 hours. Despite being a difficult place to grow up, the city has an incredible history in the world of football with talents like Leo Messi, Angel Di Maria, Gabriel Batistuta, Marcelo Bielsa and Mauricio Pochettino carving their paths here.  In this short football documentary, we delve into the reasons why.
response.tagline: Rosario is a small city in Argentina that boasts quadruple the national homicide rate, suffering a murder case once every 30 hours. Discover how despite this, the city has an incredible history of producing world-class footballing talents.
response.title: How One City Is Quietly Dominating World Football
